name: inconsequentially
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not important: They chatted inconsequentially about this and that. Thoughts flitted inconsequentially through my mind. See
inconsequential
More examplesFewer examplesThis, like other heist movies, is inconsequentially entertaining. Unless a book or movie has a sequel, we assume the charaters live happily and inconsequentially ever after.He doesn’t spend his time reflecting inconsequentially on life's little failures.
